meta.name: description
meta.content: Public High School located in Cleveland, Ohio and Parma Heights, Ohio. Invictus High School Offers Accelerated Diploma, Credit Recovery, STNA Nursing, Career Pathways, College Credit Plus and Gateway to College, Industry recognized credentials and wrap around support.

div.p: Click for an update from our Executive Director on COVID-19 and temporary changes to school operations.

h2.a: Distance Learning During Extended Spring Break

div.div: Invictus is Latin for undefeated, and that’s what our students are with an Invictus High School diploma.

div.br: At Invictus, our mission is to educate, support, and empower our students. We do this by offering individual academic plans and support for every student as well as providing resources that give them the power to overcome external barriers to graduation. Our academies model was designed to equip students with hands-on training and certifications to help them advance to graduation and post-secondary success on their personal journey.

div.div:
With three locations for convenient access, empathetic and supportive faculty and staff, two flexible in-class sections for our traditional (16-21 years) students, and the inclusion of a new online adult diploma program, Invictus High School can provide an educational foundation that is as unique as you are.
Join the undefeated by enrolling today.

span.div: We offer flexible hours and two daytime sessions to fit various scheduling needs so students can get on with their lives, and online classes for adult diploma students.
Our individualized educational model, self-paced class structure, year-round calendar, and increased technology access gives our students the tools to earn their diploma faster!
by testing out of those courses and getting credit for their previous studies. We transfer any – or no – high school credit from any previous institutions.
We make education work! Students get credit for work experience and earn industry-recognized certificates and credentials to give a leading edge in the job market upon graduation.
Our partnerships with surrounding colleges and universities give our students the opportunity to enroll concurrently and earn college credits before they finish high school!

We understand that students face barriers to graduation from outside of their classrooms. We provide real-life wrap-around supports to help our students succeed in and out of the classroom including transportation passes, school breakfast and lunch, and connections to a variety of financial and legal resources and support.

div.div: Click for an update from our Executive Director on COVID-19 and temporary changes to school operations.

h3.a: Notice: Title I / IDEA Federal Program Grants Meeting

div.div: On Thursday, October 17th, 2018 at 3:00 p.m. Invictus High School will be holding a meeting to discuss the Title I and IDEA Federal Program Grants for the 2019-2020 school year.

li.span: Over 150 College Credits/Industry Credentials Earned Concurrently
Over 400 Unique Students Served and Supported
120 Credits Earned from Career-Based Work Experience
4-Year Graduation Rate: 20.4% (Meets Ohio State DRPS Standards)
